task_description: Generate comprehensive study site content (notes + questions) for PSYC100 General Psychology course by extracting content from 11 PDF lecture files and formatting into JSON structure for the study-site application. Replace existing GPC 415 content with PSYC100 material.

phases.name: Content Analysis & Extraction
phases.description: Analyze all 11 extracted PDF text files to understand course structure, topics, and key concepts for each week
deliverables: Complete mapping of 11 weeks to corresponding PDF files and date ranges
Extracted key concepts, definitions, and theories from each lecture
Identified learning objectives and critical topics per week
Course structure document (assessment: 2 midterms 30% each, final 40%)
success_criteria: All 11 PDF text files read and analyzed
Week-to-topic mapping matches actual course schedule
Key concepts list contains 10-20 items per lecture topic
Learning objectives identified for each week

phases.name: Structured Notes Generation
phases.description: Create comprehensive, well-structured study notes for each of the 11 weeks in the JSON format matching study-site requirements
deliverables: 11 weekly JSON files (week1.json to week11.json) with structured content
Each week contains: summary, keyTakeaways, detailed content sections
Content formatted with headings, paragraphs, lists, and callouts
All psychology concepts explained clearly with examples
success_criteria: JSON structure matches existing study-site format (week, dateRange, topics array)
Each topic has 3-5 keyTakeaways
Content sections include variety: headings, paragraphs, lists, callouts
Notes are comprehensive (minimum 10 content sections per topic)
All technical terms and theories properly explained

phases.name: Question Bank Generation
phases.description: Generate multiple-choice questions (MCQs) for each week's content to test student understanding
deliverables: Minimum 15 MCQs per week (165+ total questions)
Questions covering different difficulty levels (recall, application, analysis)
Each question has 4 options with one correct answer
Questions test key concepts, theories, definitions, and applications
success_criteria: At least 15 questions per weekly JSON file
Questions match the JSON format: question, options array, answer
Mix of difficulty: 40% recall, 40% application, 20% analysis
No duplicate questions across weeks
All questions are clear, unambiguous, and accurate

phases.name: Integration & Validation
phases.description: Integrate generated content into study-site, update courseData.json, validate JSON structure, and ensure site functionality
deliverables: Updated courseData.json with PSYC100 course info
All 11 week JSON files placed in src/data/weeks/
Removed old GPC 415 content
Validated JSON syntax (no parsing errors)
Tested site renders correctly with new content
success_criteria: courseData.json updated with PSYC100 title and metadata
All weekly JSON files validated (valid JSON syntax)
No references to old GPC 415 course remain
Dev server starts without errors
Site navigation shows all 11 weeks correctly

phases.name: Final Testing
phases.description: Comprehensive testing of all implemented features. This phase uses chrome-devtools MCP for browser testing, curl for API tests, and runs any existing test suites.
deliverables: All UI features tested via browser automation
All API endpoints tested via curl/integration tests
Existing test suites pass (if applicable)
No critical bugs or regressions found
success_criteria: Core user flows work end-to-end
No console errors during testing
API responses are correct and performant
Visual appearance matches expectations

task_context.background_context: Study site is a Vite-based React application located in 'study-site/' directory. It uses JSON files to store course content. Current content is for wrong course (GPC 415 Behavior Disorders) and needs complete replacement with PSYC100 General Psychology content. The 11 PSYC100 lecture PDFs have been converted to text files in 'pdf-text-extracted/' directory.
success_criteria: All 11 weeks have complete JSON files with notes and questions
Study site displays PSYC100 content correctly
No GPC 415 content remains
Minimum 165 total MCQ questions generated
All JSON files have valid syntax
constraints: Use ONLY sonnet agents (no opus agents)
Must match existing JSON structure exactly
Questions must be unambiguous with single correct answer
relevant_files: pdf-text-extracted/PSYC100 GENERAL PSYCHOLOGY TREATMENTS AND THERAPIES.txt
